changelog.release_notes:
*EVOLUTIONS! Some of your Pokémon will now evolve based on your steps number. Visit settings for info! (I'll add the other ones)
*Added new Trainers & Pokémon: Firebreather with Vulpix, Skier with Seel!

-fixed a bug with Pebble Time Round (thanks TheRedHairedHero!)

previous version:
-Night Mode, Game Boy style: as in the orginal games, at 6:00pm the background will change! -New trainers: Beauty with Jigglypuff and Clefairy, Medium with Gastly and Police Officer with Growlithe! -Support for Pebble 4.0: Quick View won't cover the time anymore!

-Night Mode, Game Boy style: as in the orginal games, at 6:00pm the background will change!
-New trainers: Beauty with Jigglypuff and Clefairy, Medium with Gastly and Police Officer with Growlithe!
-Support for Pebble 4.0: Quick View won't cover the time anymore!
Added trainers and starters from Johto & Hoenn!

Added new trainers!
Added new Pokémon!
Optimized UI!

Added Female trainer!

Fahrenheit temperature is coming, hold on I'm close!

Pebble Time Round Support!
Text overlap fixed!

data.description:
Train and Evolve your Pokémon right from your Pebble Time with this Watchface, Poke Trainer!

Features: 
*choose your Trainer among a wide range of characters with different professions, male and female!
*choose your Starter among Bulbasaur, Charmander, Squirtle, Pikachu, Eevee, other starters and more Pokémon!
*Your Pokémon will evolve based on the number of your steps! (currently first gen starters and Eevee)
*Step count!
*Day/Night: at 18:00 (6:00PM) the background will change to night time, like in the original games!
*Weather information with Fahrenheit/Celsius Temperature!
*Time and full Date!
*Battery meter! (the dark bar under the trainer) 
*Bluetooth alert: when your phone gets disconnected a Magnemite will appear!
*Quick View Compatibility!

follow me on twitter.com/rentsmdi to stay updated on new features!
if you have any suggestions contact me!

made with <3 by rentsmdi
